EmailTemplate.name: Global_Nurture_Jetwave_ATR.201704_Global_Email_Jetwave_ATR
EmailTemplate.subject: Admit It—You and Every Passenger Crave High-Speed Wi-Fi
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> Admit It—You and Every Passenger Crave High-Speed Wi-Fi
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}},
Passenger surveys all say the same thing – your customers want the fastest, most consistent Wi-Fi connection possible. A Honeywell survey <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/~/media/wifithatflies/files/2016-connectivity-survey-infographic-en.pdf]]> even showed that passengers would abandon their preferred airline for it. A fast and secure Wi-Fi connection also opens the door to better operations and more planes in the air with better on-time arrivals. And it’s now possible to stream movies and music and to download those large work files and photos. To find out more, visit wifithatflies.com <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/wifithatflies]]>.
Please contact us for more information.
READY TO GET CONNECTED? <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/pages/Honeywell-JetWave-Provides-High-Speed-Connectivity-Globally]]>
